description: Task allows you to add and remove registry keys.

action.description: The operation (get, set, delete) to perform on the setting.

key.description: The registry key to perform the operation on (get, set, delete).

property.description: The optional registry property to perform the operation on (get, set, delete).

type.type: Enum[string, expandstring, binary, dword, multistring, qword]

force.description: Indicates to overwrite the current value of the key if it already exists. Defaults to False.

recurse.description: Indicates to delete the items in the specified locations and in all child items of the locations. Defaults to False.
